title: Rural-urban cleavage growth in Nigeria and China

content.question: Which of the following is true of cleavages in modern Nigeria and China?

choices.label: Both countries have experienced sectarian conflict among religious communities.
Both countries are experiencing deepening rural-urban divides.
Pro-western groups repeatedly clash with nationalists.
Ethnic separatism poses no major threat to central government institutions.
Social inequality has been reduced as a result of foreign investment.

content.answer: Both countries are experiencing deepening rural-urban divides.
